snippet: The president of the North Carolina chapter of the NAACP shares his thoughts on the intersectionality of today’s protest movements.
abstract: The president of the North Carolina chapter of the NAACP shares his thoughts on the intersectionality of today’s protest movements.
lead_paragraph: Rev. Dr. William Barber II is president of the North Carolina chapter of the NAACP and one of the leaders of the Moral Mondays movement. He shared his thoughts on today’s protesters with me by email.
